sect1.title: Changing the Ownership Of The CLFS System
sect1.para: Throughout the book, every package has been compiled and installed as the lfs user. The final system should be owned by root.

important.para: The commands in the remainder of this book must be performed while logged in as root. Check that $LFS is still set:

sect1.para: First, Change the user: group on the entire lfs system.
